text:
A gem of a school. We sent our daughter here and were so impressed we pulled out son out of his school to send him as well.

Extremely dedicated teachers, rigorous curriculum, and owners that go the extra mile for parents. The student teacher ratio is unmatched anywhere in Singapore.
Absolutely wonderful and welcoming school. We send both our kids there and they love it. Cozy and intimate environment with a lot of individual attention. The teachers are the best
